Browse our selection of cheap dishwashers for sale. We have freestanding, slim line, semi-integrated and integrated dishwashers in stock. A fully integrated dishwasher fits beneath your countertop with the door covered by your kitchen unit. A semi integrated dishwasher gives you a completely front facing machine, fits into your kitchen cabinet and sits just above your skirting board or plinth. Freestanding dishwashers require no integration to your cabinets and stand freely on your kitchen floor. We recommend all models are installed by professional installers.

Dishwasher Brands We Sell


We’re proud to stock the most reliable brands on the market. One of our most popular is Montpellier dishwashers which are great value. We also stock Whirlpool, Bosch, Samsung, and our most recent addition Sharp dishwashers.

Choosing Your Dishwasher


Refine your search to filter by measurements, the amount of place settings, warranty, brand and more. Read our dishwasher reviews from customers just like you, to ensure you’re getting the one for you. If you have any questions on any of the machines below, call us on 01-5312270 and we’ll be happy to help. We also offer dishwasher installation, simply select ‘installation’ on the basket page.

Need your dishwasher delivered fast? We give you your preferred delivery day including next day delivery; simply select your preferred day at the checkout.
